name: Sonic Smackdown
description:
Hey everyone, Here's the official itch.io release of Sonic Smackdown!

As always, this project will remain free but if you're having fun with it, please consider donating to help us grow as game developers!

If you're having technical issues with the game, we have an FAQ page up in our discord community!

Click here to join our Discord Community!

Disclaimer: Sonic and all characters associated belong to SEGA. All rights belong to SEGA and we claim no copyright. Any donations  are not for Sonic Smackdown or anything Sonic related.

Project Overview:

Gameplay heavily inspired by Ultimate Marvel vs Capcom 3, Sonic Smackdown brings the fast paced combos and intuitive controls to the Sonic franchise. You'll be able to pull off combos at blazing speeds which only Sonic and crew are capable of!

Gameplay features:

  • 10 Playable Characters
  • Arcade Mode
  • Versus Mode
  • Training Mode
  • Online play available through Parsec
